short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping users find places to eat, live, stay, wed, work and play within close proximity to locations that matter most to them

bring your personal places of interest directly into your search.

#Easily plan your trips
The Extension allows you to calculate the shortest travel distance between your origin and up to three destination locations for roundtrip calculations or up to ten destination locations for one-way trip calculations.

#Customize your trips
Create a destination list based on your personal places of interest, and use it to calculate both roundtrip and one-way trip distances. This feature lets you tailor your trips to suit your preferences.

#Get directions with ease
The Extension links to Google Maps, where you can get turn-by-turn directions between a pair of origin and destination locations. This feature saves you time and makes navigating your trips a breeze.

#Curate multi-stop trips
Build multi-stop trips by curating a list of destination locations, combining your points of interest with places you discover across the Unmove portal directory. This feature lets you customize your trips to your liking, adding more excitement and adventure to your travels.

Whether you're moving to a new city, planning a trip, or just exploring your hometown, our extension makes it easy to discover all the best spots within close proximity. 

Install Unmove today, it‚Äôs free.

How it Works
(1) Add list of preferred places of Interest.
(2) Visit listing page of any website from the Portal Directory.
(3) When the extension badge lights up, click it and run the calculation.

Try it now and experience your city like never before!
